summary: This bill, H.R. 2001, aims to reauthorize a grant program focused on addressing dental workforce needs. It proposes amending Section 340G(f) of the Public Health Service Act. Specifically, it seeks to replace the previous funding allocation of $13,903,000 for each of fiscal years 2019-2023 with $15,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2026-2030, with funds remaining available until expended. Introduced by Ms. Kelly of Illinois and Mr. Simpson, the bill was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce.
